Don’t underscore-prefix private helper methods or static C functions.

- (void)_buttonAction:(CKComponent *)sender
{
  _logEvent(@"button tapped");
}

We discourage subclassing components, so we don’t need to worry about distinguishing public and private methods or colliding with methods in the superclass.

objc++ - (void)buttonAction:(CKComponent *)sender { logEvent(@"button tapped"); }
